mapper.select: /* MemberMapper.selectMember */ SELECT MEMB.ID , MEMB.AUTH_CD , MEMB.DEPT_CD , MEMB.PWD PASSWORD , MEMB.MEMBER_NM , MEMB.MEMBER_NM_ENG , MEMB.POSITION_CD , MEMB.EMAIL , MEMB.TEL_NO , MEMB.FAIL_CNT , MEMB.FIRST_LOGIN_YN , MEMB.LAST_LOGIN_DT , MEMB.REMARK , MEMB.USE_YN , MEMB.REG_DT , MEMB.REG_ID , MEMB.UPD_DT , MEMB.UPD_ID , MENU.URL FROM MEMBER MEMB , AUTH_DTL AUTH , ADMIN.MENU MENU WHERE MEMB.ID = #{username} AND MEMB.AUTH_CD = AUTH.AUTH_CD(+) AND AUTH.MENU_CD = MENU.MENU_CD(+)
/* MemberMapper.selectAuthUrl */ SELECT MENU.URL FROM MEMBER MEMB , AUTH_DTL AUTH , ADMIN.MENU MENU WHERE MEMB.ID = #{username} AND MEMB.AUTH_CD = AUTH.AUTH_CD(+) AND AUTH.MENU_CD = MENU.MENU_CD(+)
mapper.update: /* MemberMapper.mergeToken */ MERGE INTO TEMP_TABLE A USING (SELECT #{username} MEMBER_ID FROM DUAL) B ON (A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.TOKEN = #{token} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (MEMBER_ID, TOKEN) VALUES (#{username}, #{token})
